movies.title: Ski School 2
movies.plot: Dave is invited to his former girlfriend's wedding and it is his duty to make sure it doesn't happen since her fiance has plans to take over the resort once they're married
movies.simplePlot: Dave Marshak returns to the Ski School mountain to stop his ex-girlfriend's wedding.

biography.bio: Dean Cameron was born on December 25, 1962 in Morrison, Illinois, USA as Dean Eikleberry. He is an actor, known for Summer School (1987), Straight Outta Compton (2015) and Sleep with Me (1994). He has been married to Jessie S. Marion since April 9, 2004.
biography.name: Dean Cameron

biography.bio: Heather Campbell is an actress, known for Police Academy: The Series (1997), Ski School 2 (1994) and Murder in Small Town X (2001).
biography.name: Heather Campbell

biography.bio: Doug Copithorne was born in 1963 in British Columbia, Canada. He is an actor, known for Ski School 2 (1994), Misinterpreted (1995) and University Hospital (1995).
biography.name: Doug Copithorne

biography.bio: Bil Dwyer was born on March 30, 1962 in Evergreen Park, Illinois, USA as William Michael Dwyer. He is an actor and writer, known for BattleBots (2000), Once and Future Queen (2000) and Extreme Dodgeball (2004).
biography.name: Bil Dwyer

biography.bio: Tall (5'10"), busty and voluptuous brunette knockout Wendy Hamilton was born on December 20, 1967 in Detroit, Michigan. Wendy grew up on Florida's Gulf Coast. Her father raced Corvette sports cars and was a test pilot for speed boats while her mother was a fashion model. Hamilton started out modeling swimsuits at age twelve in local fashion shows; she made her modeling debut at a shopping mall in Bradenton, Florida in 1979. Wendy was the captain of the basketball team the Hurricanes at Manatee High School in Bradenton. In 1988 she survived two brutal automobile accidents which occurred at the same exact Detroit intersection (one of these crashes sent her flying through the windshield of her car and the resultant severe injuries required 180 stitches). Hamilton was the Playmate of the Month in the December, 1991 issue of "Playboy." Wendy was featured in a large number of "Playboy" videos and posed for a slew of "Playboy" newsstand special editions. Moreover, Wendy Hamilton not only made a guest appearance on an episode of the TV series "NewsRadio," but also acted in several low-budget movies which include "Ski School 2," "The Dallas Connection," and "Midnight Temptations."
biography.name: Wendy Hamilton

biography.bio: Noah Heney is an actor, known for Snow Falling on Cedars (1999), Le détonateur (1998) and Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Noah Heney

biography.bio: Will Sasso was born in Ladner, British Columbia (a suburb of Vancouver), to a family of Italian descent. He grew up respecting comedy of all styles, thanks in part to an unhealthy relationship with the family television that began when Will was around two or three. With his mind consequently bent, Sasso decided at an early age to become an actor. At the age of fifteen, he landed his first agent and quickly began booking roles in television and film. Before moving from Vancouver to Los Angeles, Sasso starred for five seasons as the quirky teen, "Derek Wakaluk" on the award-winning Canadian dramatic series Madison (1993) allowing him to hone his acting and improvisational skills as well as providing him with enough money to buy a television of his own. Will starred for five seasons on FOX's hit sketch comedy series MADtv (1995) giving TV viewers a reason to stay up late with characters like the accident-prone handyman "Paul Timberman" and offbeat impressions of Bill Clinton, Kenny Rogers, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Steven Seagal and Randy Newman. After a successful tenure with the show beginning in 1997, Sasso decided to leave the late-night staple in 2002, eager to explore the next stage of his career. Moviegoers know Sasso from his roles in more than twenty-five feature films including Best in Show (2000), directed by Christopher Guest, Belles à mourir (1999), Beverly Hills Ninja (1997) starring the late Chris Farley, and The Hot Chick (2002) starring Rob Schneider and produced by Adam Sandler, with whom Sasso previously worked on Happy Gilmore (1996). More recently, Sasso can be seen every week as "Carl Monari" on the ABC sitcom Less Than Perfect (2002). In his spare time, Sasso enjoys the outdoors and the indoors.
biography.name: Will Sasso

biography.bio: Brent Sheppard was born on August 1, 1960 as Brent James Douglas Sheppard. He is an actor, known for 50/50 (2011), Ski School 2 (1994) and Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story (2002). He has been married to Tracy Sheppard since 1983. They have two children.
biography.name: Brent Sheppard

biography.bio: Jane Sowerby was born in Kelowna, British Columbia, Canada. She is an actress and producer, known for Jane Post (2002), MVP: Most Valuable Primate (2000) and MVP: Most Vertical Primate (2001).
biography.name: Jane Sowerby

biography.bio: Carrie-Lee Alhassan is an actress, known for Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Carrie-Lee Alhassan

biography.bio: Cinnamon Bond is an actress, known for Ski School 2 (1994) and My Name Is Kate (1994).
biography.name: Cinnamon Bond

biography.bio: Matt Brasier is an actor, known for Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Matt Brasier

biography.bio: Shannon Lee Brown is an actress, known for Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Shannon Lee Brown

biography.bio: Tiffany Burns is known for her work on Watchmen (2009), Another Cinderella Story (2008) and Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Tiffany Burns

biography.bio: Shawn Carle is an actor, known for Ski School 2 (1994).
biography.name: Shawn Carle
